title: ‘Perfection Does Not Exist’: How UAE Team Emirates Plans to Shine Even Brighter in 2025
content:
It’s a lot more than just Pogačar: Ayuso and Yates target Giro and aim to avoid their ambitions getting lost in talent-stacked super team.

Read the full article at ‘Perfection Does Not Exist’: How UAE Team Emirates Plans to Shine Even Brighter in 2025 on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
